articles.title: Engelska Fraser fÃ¶r Svartsjuka och FÃ¶rtroende
articles.content:
Svartsjuka Ã¤r en naturlig kÃ¤nsla som kan uppstÃ¥ i alla relationer. Att kunna kommunicera om dessa kÃ¤nslor pÃ¥ engelska hjÃ¤lper dig och din partner att bygga starkare fÃ¶rtroende.

## Fraser fÃ¶r att Uttrycka Svartsjuka

### 1. "I feel insecure when..."
**Uttal:** aj fiil in-si-kjur wen

**Betydelse:** Jag kÃ¤nner mig osÃ¤ker nÃ¤r...

Ett Ã¤rligt sÃ¤tt att uttrycka osÃ¤kerhet utan att anklaga.

### 2. "Can you help me understand your relationship with...?"
**Uttal:** kÃ¤n juu help mii andÉ™r-stÃ¤nd jor ri-lej-shÉ™n-ship wiÎ¸

**Betydelse:** Kan du hjÃ¤lpa mig fÃ¶rstÃ¥ din relation med...?

Ã–ppnar fÃ¶r dialog istÃ¤llet fÃ¶r konfrontation.

### 3. "I trust you, but I'm struggling with my feelings"
**Uttal:** aj trast juu, bat ajm strag-ling wiÎ¸ maj fii-lings

**Betydelse:** Jag litar pÃ¥ dig, men jag kÃ¤mpar med mina kÃ¤nslor

Skiljer pÃ¥ fÃ¶rtroende och personliga kÃ¤nslor.

### 4. "I need some reassurance"
**Uttal:** aj niid sam rii-É™-shu-rÉ™ns

**Betydelse:** Jag behÃ¶ver lite bekrÃ¤ftelse

En Ã¤rlig fÃ¶rfrÃ¥gan om stÃ¶d.

### 5. "It bothers me when..."
**Uttal:** it boÃ°-É™rz mii wen

**Betydelse:** Det stÃ¶r mig nÃ¤r...

Uttrycker obehag utan aggression.

## Fraser fÃ¶r att Bygga FÃ¶rtroende

### 6. "I only have eyes for you"
**Uttal:** aj oun-li hÃ¤v ajz for juu

**Betydelse:** Jag har bara Ã¶gon fÃ¶r dig

En fÃ¶rsÃ¤kran om lojalitet.

### 7. "You're the only one for me"
**Uttal:** jor Ã°É™ oun-li wan for mii

**Betydelse:** Du Ã¤r den enda fÃ¶r mig

BekrÃ¤ftar exklusivitet.

### 8. "I would never do anything to hurt you"
**Uttal:** aj wud nev-É™r duu en-i-Î¸ing tu hÉ™rt juu

**Betydelse:** Jag skulle aldrig gÃ¶ra nÃ¥got som skadar dig

Ett lÃ¶fte om omsorg.

### 9. "Let's be open with each other"
**Uttal:** lets bii ou-pÉ™n wiÎ¸ iitsh aÃ°É™r

**Betydelse:** LÃ¥t oss vara Ã¶ppna med varandra

Uppmuntrar till transparens.

### 10. "I want you to meet my friends"
**Uttal:** aj wont juu tu miit maj frendz

**Betydelse:** Jag vill att du trÃ¤ffar mina vÃ¤nner

Visar inkludering och Ã¶ppenhet.

### 11. "There's nothing to worry about"
**Uttal:** Ã°erz naÎ¸-ing tu wÉ™r-i É™-baut

**Betydelse:** Det finns inget att oroa sig fÃ¶r

Lugnar och fÃ¶rsÃ¤krar.

### 12. "I choose you every day"
**Uttal:** aj tÊƒuuz juu ev-ri dej

**Betydelse:** Jag vÃ¤ljer dig varje dag

En vacker bekrÃ¤ftelse av engagemang.

## Kulturella Tips

I engelsktalande kulturer:

- VÃ¤rderas Ã¶ppen kommunikation om kÃ¤nslor
- Respekteras individuell frihet inom relationen
- Uppskattas Ã¤rlighet om osÃ¤kerheter
- Ses kontrollbeteende negativt

## Avslutande Tankar

Svartsjuka Ã¤r mÃ¤nskligt, men hur vi hanterar den definierar vÃ¥ra relationer. Med dessa fraser kan du kommunicera Ã¶ppet och bygga starkare fÃ¶rtroende.

articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';

Germana are o colecÈ›ie surprinzÄƒtor de drÄƒgÄƒlaÈ™Äƒ de alinturi! De la clasicele "Schatz" È™i "Liebling" la alinturile cu animale adorabile, vei descoperi cÄƒ germanii sunt mai romantici decÃ¢t par.

## Alinturile Clasice

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Schatz"
  translation="ComoarÄƒ / Iubire"
  pronunciation="È™ats"
  context="Cel mai popular È™i universal alint Ã®n germanÄƒ."
/>

### Cele Mai Populare

<VocabCard
  word="Schatz / Schatzi"
  translation="ComoarÄƒ / Comoara mea"
  pronunciation="È™ats / È™atsi"
  example="Schatz, kommst du? (Iubire, vii?)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Liebling"
  translation="Dragul/Draga mea"
  pronunciation="lib-ling"
  example="Guten Morgen, Liebling! (BunÄƒ dimineaÈ›a, dragÄƒ!)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Mein Herz"

  pronunciation="main herts"
  example="Du bist mein Herz. (EÈ™ti inimÄƒ mea.)"
/>

  pronunciation="main ain unt a-les"
  example="Du bist mein Ein und Alles. (EÈ™ti totul pentru mine.)"
/>

<CultureTip title="Schatz - Regele Alinturilor" flag="ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª">
"Schatz" (comoarÄƒ) este de departe cel mai popular alint Ã®n germanÄƒ. Aproape fiecare cuplu german Ã®l foloseÈ™te! "Schatzi" este versiunea diminutivÄƒ, È™i mai drÄƒgÄƒlaÈ™Äƒ.
</CultureTip>

## Alinturi cu Animale

Germanii adorÄƒ sÄƒ-È™i numeascÄƒ partenerii cu nume de animale drÄƒgÄƒlaÈ™e:

<VocabCard
  word="Maus / Mausi"
  translation="È˜oricicÄƒ"
  pronunciation="maus / mausi"
  example="Mausi, was machst du? (È˜oricicÄƒ, ce faci?)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Hase / Hasi"

  pronunciation="ha-ze / ha-zi"
  example="Komm her, Hasi! (Vino-ncoace, iepuraÈ™ule!)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="BÃ¤r / BÃ¤rchen"
  translation="Urs / UrsuleÈ›"
  pronunciation="ber / ber-hen"
  example="Mein BÃ¤rchen, ich liebe dich. (UrsuleÈ›ul meu, te iubesc.)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Spatz / Spatzi"
  translation="Vrabie / VrÄƒbiuÈ›Äƒ"
  pronunciation="È™pats / È™patsi"
  example="Gute Nacht, Spatzi! (Noapte bunÄƒ, vrÄƒbiuÈ›Äƒ!)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Schnecke"
  translation="Melc (afectuos!)"
  pronunciation="È™ne-ke"
  example="Meine kleine Schnecke. (Melcul meu mic.)"
/>

<CultureTip title="Schnecke - Un Alint Ciudat dar DrÄƒguÈ›" flag="ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª">
Da, germanii Ã®È™i numesc partenerii "melc"! Nu e negativ - e foarte afectuos È™i popular, mai ales pentru femei. AratÄƒ cÄƒ persoana este drÄƒguÈ›Äƒ È™i "de pus Ã®n buzunar."
</CultureTip>

## Alinturi Dulci

<VocabCard
  word="SÃ¼ÃŸe / SÃ¼ÃŸer"
  translation="DulceaÈ›Äƒ"
  pronunciation="zÃ¼-se / zÃ¼-ser"
  example="Hey SÃ¼ÃŸe, wie geht's? (Hei dulceaÈ›Äƒ, ce faci?)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Zuckerpuppe"
  translation="PÄƒpuÈ™Äƒ de zahÄƒr"
  pronunciation="tsu-ker-pu-pe"
  example="Meine Zuckerpuppe ist da! (PÄƒpuÈ™a mea de zahÄƒr e aici!)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Honigkuchen"
  translation="TurtÄƒ dulce"
  pronunciation="ho-nih-ku-hen"
  example="Mein Honigkuchen, du bist so sÃ¼ÃŸ."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Schnucki"

## Alinturi Elegante

<VocabCard

/>

<VocabCard
  word="Engel"
  translation="Ãnger"
  pronunciation="en-ghel"
  example="Du bist mein Engel. (EÈ™ti Ã®ngerul meu.)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Prinzessin"
  translation="PrinÈ›esÄƒ"
  pronunciation="prin-tse-sin"
  example="Guten Morgen, meine Prinzessin!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="KÃ¶nigin / KÃ¶nig"
  translation="ReginÄƒ / Rege"
  pronunciation="kÃ¶-ni-ghin / kÃ¶-nih"
  example="Du bist meine KÃ¶nigin. (EÈ™ti regina mea.)"
/>

## Alinturi JucÄƒuÈ™e

<VocabCard
  word="KnuddelbÃ¤r"
  translation="UrsuleÈ› de Ã®mbrÄƒÈ›iÈ™at"
  pronunciation="knu-del-ber"
  example="Komm her, mein KnuddelbÃ¤r!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Kuschelmaus"
  translation="È˜oricicÄƒ de Ã®mbrÄƒÈ›iÈ™at"
  pronunciation="ku-È™el-maus"
  example="Meine kleine Kuschelmaus."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Schnuffel"
  translation="PufuleÈ› (de la sforÄƒit drÄƒguÈ›)"
  pronunciation="È™nu-fel"
  example="Schlaf gut, Schnuffel."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Pummelchen"
  translation="RotunjoarÄƒ (afectuos!)"
  pronunciation="pu-mel-hen"
  example="Mein sÃ¼ÃŸes Pummelchen."
/>

<CultureTip title="Diminutive Germane" flag="ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª">
Ãn germanÄƒ, poÈ›i face orice cuvÃ¢nt mai drÄƒguÈ› adÄƒugÃ¢nd -chen sau -lein: Schatz â†’ SchÃ¤tzchen, Maus â†’ MÃ¤uschen. Acestea transformÄƒ orice substantiv Ã®ntr-un alint!
</CultureTip>

## Tabel Comparativ: Intensitate

| Nivel | Alinturi |
|-------|----------|
| Formal | Meine Liebe, Mein Lieber |
| Elegant | Liebling, Engel |
| Casual | Schatz, Schatzi |
| JucÄƒuÈ™ | Maus, Hase, BÃ¤rchen |
| Foarte drÄƒguÈ› | Schnucki, Kuschelmaus |

## Alinturi Regionale

### Germania
- **Schatz** - Universal
- **Schnecke** - Popular Ã®n sud
- **Perle** - Popular Ã®n nord (perlÄƒ)

### Austria
- **Schatzi** - Mai comun decÃ¢t Schatz
- **Mausi** - Foarte popular
- **Bussi** - SÄƒrut/pupic

### ElveÈ›ia
- **SchÃ¤tzeli** - Diminutiv elveÈ›ian
- **MÃ¼sli** - È˜oricuÈ›Äƒ (nu cereale!)


## Expresii Complete cu Alinturi

  word="Ich liebe dich, mein Schatz"

  example="Gute Nacht, Mausi. TrÃ¤um sÃ¼ÃŸ!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Komm her, BÃ¤rchen"
  translation="Vino-ncoace, ursuleÈ›ule"

/>

<CTA
  text="Vrei sÄƒ stÄƒpÃ¢neÈ™ti alinturile germane?"

articles.title: Macarca Ã–zlem Ä°fadeleri: Seni Ã–zledim ve Hasret SÃ¶zleri
articles.content:
# Macarca Ã–zlem Ä°fadeleri: Seni Ã–zledim ve Hasret SÃ¶zleri

Macarlar tutkulu ve duygusal bir kÃ¼ltÃ¼re sahiptir. Ã–zlem duygularÄ± aÃ§Ä±kÃ§a ifade edilir ve bu, yakÄ±n iliÅŸkilerin Ã¶nemli bir parÃ§asÄ±dÄ±r. Bu rehberde Macarca Ã¶zlem ifadelerini Ã¶ÄŸreneceksiniz.

## Temel Ã–zlem Ä°fadeleri

### 1. "HiÃ¡nyzol"
**Telaffuz:** "Hianyozol"
**Anlam:** Seni Ã¶zledim (EksikliÄŸini hissediyorum)

En temel Ã¶zlem ifadesi.

### 2. "Nagyon hiÃ¡nyzol"

**Anlam:** Seni Ã§ok Ã¶zledim

### 3. "VÃ¡gyom utÃ¡nad"

Daha derin bir Ã¶zlem.

### 4. "BÃ¡rcsak itt lennÃ©l"

**Anlam:** KeÅŸke burada olsaydÄ±n

### 5. "Folyton rÃ¡d gondolok"
**Telaffuz:** "Folyton rad gondolok"
**Anlam:** SÃ¼rekli seni dÃ¼ÅŸÃ¼nÃ¼yorum

### 6. "NÃ©lkÃ¼led Ã¼res minden"
**Telaffuz:** "NelkÃ¼led Ã¼reÅŸ minden"
**Anlam:** Sensiz her ÅŸey boÅŸ

### 7. "SzÃ¡molom a napokat, amÃ­g talÃ¡lkozunk"
**Telaffuz:** "Samolom a napokat, amig talalkozunk"
**Anlam:** BuluÅŸana kadar gÃ¼nleri sayÄ±yorum

### 8. "Mindent jelentesz nekem"
**Telaffuz:** "Mindent yelenteÅŸ nekem"
**Anlam:** Benim iÃ§in her ÅŸey demeksin

### 9. "A szÃ­vem Ã©rted dobog"
**Telaffuz:** "A sivem erted dobog"
**Anlam:** Kalbim senin iÃ§in atÄ±yor

Romantik bir ifade.

### 10. "RemÃ©lem, hamarosan lÃ¡tlak"
**Telaffuz:** "Remelem, hamaroÅŸan latlak"
**Anlam:** UmarÄ±m yakÄ±nda gÃ¶rÃ¼rÃ¼m seni

### 11. "Minden nap nÃ©lkÃ¼led nehÃ©z"
**Telaffuz:** "Minden nap nelkÃ¼led nehez"
**Anlam:** Sensiz her gÃ¼n zor

## KÃ¼ltÃ¼rel Ä°puÃ§larÄ±

**Åiirsel Dil:** Macarlar ÅŸiirsel ve duygusal ifadeleri sever. Ã–zlem duyduÄŸunuzda yaratÄ±cÄ± ve duygusal olun.

**Mektup GeleneÄŸi:** YazÄ±lÄ± iletiÅŸim Macar kÃ¼ltÃ¼rÃ¼nde Ã¶nemlidir. Ã–zlem dolu bir mektup Ã§ok deÄŸerli olabilir.

**MÃ¼zik:** Macar mÃ¼ziÄŸi genellikle Ã¶zlem ve hasret temalarÄ±nÄ± iÅŸler. Bir Macar ÅŸarkÄ±sÄ± paylaÅŸmak anlamlÄ± bir jest olabilir.

**TÃ¼rk-Macar BaÄŸlarÄ±:** Ä°ki kÃ¼ltÃ¼r arasÄ±ndaki tarihi baÄŸlar, duygusal ifade biÃ§imlerinde benzerlikler oluÅŸturmuÅŸtur.

## SonuÃ§

Macarca Ã¶zlem ifadelerini Ã¶ÄŸrenmek, Macar sevdiklerinizle baÄŸÄ±nÄ±zÄ± derinleÅŸtirir. BudapeÅŸte'nin romantik atmosferini Ã¶zlem dolu sÃ¶zlerle paylaÅŸÄ±n!

articles.title: Ghid de Pronuntie Greaca: Sunete Esentiale pentru Romani
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Greaca foloseÈ™te un alfabet propriu, dar multe sunete sunt similare cu romÃ¢nÄƒ. Odata Ã®nvaÈ›Äƒt alfabetul, cititul devine simplu!

## Alfabetul Grec

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Î£'Î±Î³Î±Ï€Ï"
  translation="Te iubesc"
  pronunciation="sa-ga-PO"
  context="Practica sunetele fundamentale cu aceasta frazÄƒ romanticÄƒ."
/>

### Cele 24 de Litere

| Litera | Nume | Sunet | Exemplu |
|--------|------|-------|---------|
| Î‘ Î± | alfa | a | Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î· (dragoste) |
| Î’ Î² | vita | v | Î²ÏÎ±Î´Î¹Î¬ (seara) |
| Î“ Î³ | gamma | gh/y | Î³Î»Ï…ÎºÏŒ (dulce) |
| Î” Î´ | delta | th englez | Î´ÏÎ¿ (doi) |
| Î• Îµ | epsilon | e | ÎµÏƒÏ (tu) |
| Î– Î¶ | zita | z | Î¶Ï‰Î® (viata) |
| Î— Î· | ita | i | Î·Î¼Î­ÏÎ± (zi) |
| Î˜ Î¸ | thita | th surd | Î¸Î¬Î»Î±ÏƒÏƒÎ± (mare) |
| Î™ Î¹ | iota | i | ÎºÎ±Î¹ (si) |
| Îš Îº | kappa | k | ÎºÎ±Î»ÏŒÏ‚ (bun) |
| Î› Î» | lamda | l | Î»ÏŒÎ³Î¿Ï‚ (cuvant) |
| Îœ Î¼ | mi | m | Î¼Î±Î¼Î¬ (mama) |

| Litera | Nume | Sunet | Exemplu |
|--------|------|-------|---------|
| Î Î½ | ni | n | Î½Î±Î¹ (da) |
| Î Î¾ | xi | ks | Î¾Î­ÏÏ‰ (stiu) |
| ÎŸ Î¿ | omicron | o | ÏŒÏ‡Î¹ (nu) |
| Î  Ï€ | pi | p | Ï€Î¿Î»Ï (foarte) |
| Î¡ Ï | ro | r | ÏÎ¿Î¼Î±Î½Ï„Î¹ÎºÏŒÏ‚ (romantic) |
| Î£ Ïƒ/Ï‚ | sigma | s | ÏƒÏ€Î¯Ï„Î¹ (casa) |
| Î¤ Ï„ | taf | t | Ï„Î¹ (ce) |
| Î¥ Ï… | ipsilon | i | ÏƒÏ… (tu) |
| Î¦ Ï† | fi | f | Ï†Î¹Î»Î¯ (sarut) |
| Î§ Ï‡ | hi | h aspirat | Ï‡ÏÏŒÎ½Î¿Ï‚ (timp) |
| Î¨ Ïˆ | psi | ps | ÏˆÏ…Ï‡Î® (suflet) |
| Î© Ï‰ | omega | o | ÏÏÎ± (ora) |

<VocabCard
  word="Alfa, vita, gamma..."
  translation="Primele trei litere ale alfabetului"
  pronunciation="AL-fa VI-ta GA-ma"
  example="Alfabetul grec este baza multor alfabete moderne!"
/>

<CultureTip title="Trei Moduri pentru I" flag="ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·">
In greacÄƒ existÄƒ trei litere care suna "i": Î· (ita), Î¹ (iota), Ï… (ipsilon). Si combinatiile ÎµÎ¹, Î¿Î¹ suna "i"!
</CultureTip>

## Combinatii de Litere

### Diftongi

| Combinatie | Sunet | Exemplu |
|------------|-------|---------|
| Î±Î¹ | e | ÎºÎ±Î¹ (ke) |
| ÎµÎ¹ | i | ÎµÎ¯Î¼Î±Î¹ (I-me) |
| Î¿Î¹ | i | Ï€Î¿Î¹Î¿Ï‚ (pios) |
| Î¿Ï… | u | Ï€Î¿Ï… (pu) |
| Î±Ï… | av/af | Î±Ï…Ï„ÏŒÏ‚ (af-TOS) |
| ÎµÏ… | ev/ef | ÎµÏ…Ï‡Î±ÏÎ¹ÏƒÏ„Ï (ef-ha-ri-STO) |

<VocabCard
  word="Î‘Î¥ - av sau af"
  translation="Suna 'av' inainte de vocale, 'af' inainte de consoane surde"
  pronunciation="av/af"
  example="Î±Ï…Ï„ÏŒÏ‚ (af-TOS), Î±ÏÏÎ¹Î¿ (AV-rio)"
/>

### Consoane Duble

| Combinatie | Sunet | Exemplu |
|------------|-------|---------|
| Î¼Ï€ | b (Ã®nceput) / mb | Î¼Ï€Î±Î¼Ï€Î¬Ï‚ (ba-BAS) |
| Î½Ï„ | d (Ã®nceput) / nd | Î½Ï„Î¿Î¼Î¬Ï„Î± (do-MA-ta) |
| Î³Îº | g (Ã®nceput) / ng | Î³ÎºÎ±ÏÏƒÏŒÎ½ (gar-SON) |
| Ï„Ïƒ | ts | Ï„ÏƒÎ¬Î¹ (TSAI) |
| Ï„Î¶ | dz | Ï„Î¶Î¬ÎºÎ¹ (DZA-ki) |

<VocabCard
  word="ÎœÎ  - sunet B"
  translation="La Ã®nceputul cuvantului suna B"
  pronunciation="b"
  example="Î¼Ï€Î±Î¼Ï€Î¬Ï‚ (tata) = ba-BAS"
/>

## Accentul

In greacÄƒ, fiecare cuvant de mai mult de o silaba are un accent scris care indica unde cade accentul:

<VocabCard
  word="Î±Î³Î¬Ï€Î·"
  translation="Dragoste"
  pronunciation="a-GA-pi"
  example="Accentul cade pe a doua silaba."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="ÎºÎ±Î»Î·Î¼Î­ÏÎ±"
  translation="Buna dimineata"
  pronunciation="ka-li-ME-ra"
  example="Accentul cade pe penultima silaba."
/>

## Fraze pentru Practica

| Greaca | Romana | Pronuntie |
|--------|--------|-----------|
| Î“ÎµÎ¹Î± ÏƒÎ¿Ï… | Buna | YA su |
| Î•Ï…Ï‡Î±ÏÎ¹ÏƒÏ„Ï | Multumesc | ef-ha-ri-STO |
| Î Î±ÏÎ±ÎºÎ±Î»Ï | Te rog/Cu placere | pa-ra-ka-LO |
| Î£Ï…Î³Î³Î½ÏÎ¼Î· | Scuze | sig-NO-mi |
| ÎšÎ±Î»Î·Î½ÏÏ‡Ï„Î± | Noapte bunÄƒ | ka-li-NIH-ta |
| Î¦Î¹Î»Î¬ÎºÎ¹Î± | Sarutari | fi-LA-kia |

<CultureTip title="Similitudini cu Romana" flag="ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡·">
Multe cuvinte romanesti deriva din greacÄƒ! "Filosofie", "democratie", "economie" - aceste radacini fac multe cuvinte grecesti familiare.
</CultureTip>

<CTA />

articles.title: Guia de PronÃºncia Polonesa para Casais: Aprenda a Falar Com Amor
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

ComeÃ§ar a falar polonÃªs com seu amor pode parecer assustador - afinal, aqueles encontros consonantais! Mas aqui estÃ¡ o segredo: a pronÃºncia polonesa Ã© muito mais previsÃ­vel que o portuguÃªs. Com alguns truques simples, vocÃªs dois estarÃ£o trocando frases doces em pouco tempo. Imagine a cara de surpresa do seu parceiro quando vocÃª pronunciar perfeitamente "Kocham CiÄ™" pela primeira vez!

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Kocham CiÄ™"
  translation="Eu te amo"
  pronunciation="KOH-hahm chyeh"
  context="A frase mais importante - pratiquem juntos todos os dias!"
